channel.title: How do i move an object and add height to it
channel.description:
[color=maroon]I've been working on the source "Solitude" for a while now and i came to this problem. :confused:I want to move an altar to the second floor of a building :confused:. I've looked everywhere but can't figure it out. If someone can please help me out it would be really appreciated. Once again the source is "Solitude".
[color=blue]In advance, Thanks to anyone who helps. :)

item.title: How do i move an object and add height to it
item.dc:creator: @instantrebirth instantrebirth
item.description:
@instantrebirth wrote:

Why is it not allowed?

BTW thanks for helping me but i figured out what was wrong and fixed it. Now i don’t have this problem.

I was trying to put the altar where i already got rid of the item that was originally there. So i think it caused the altar to not show up.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i move an object and add height to it
item.dc:creator: @instantrebirth instantrebirth
item.description:
@instantrebirth wrote:

ugh… I did that exact thing. Step by step. I really don’t know why it doesn’t work. I want to move a chaos altar to a location, here is what i put. Can you check if i did it right…

public void loadCustomSpawns(Client c) { c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4151, 2605, 3153, 1, 10); //portal home FunPk c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(411, 3211, 3225, 2, 10); //chaos altar

Read full topic

item.title: How do i move an object and add height to it
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

ObjectManager.java

LOOK FOR
public void loadCustomSpawns(Client c) {

under that put
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(id, x, y, h, 10);

ID = ALTAR ID
X = X COORD
Y = Y COORD
H = HEIGHT

is this enough information?

h = height so that should be 1
